thread.title: Wolfpack to open 2017 season against Gamecocks in Charlotte
thread.title_full: Wolfpack to open 2017 season against Gamecocks in Charlotte

title: Wolfpack to open 2017 season against Gamecocks in Charlotte
text:
Border-state fight: NC State set to open 2017 football season vs. South Carolina in Charlotte THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   1:45 pmLast   1:46 pm   
Organizations: 
North Carolina (541) 

CHARLOTTE, North Carolina — North Carolina State and South Carolina have agreed to meet in the 2017 opener in Charlotte, North Carolina. 
The specific date of the game between the Wolfpack and Gamecocks will be set later. It will be held in Bank of America Stadium, home to the NFL's Carolina Panthers and located near the state line between the Carolinas. 
It will be the first meeting between the schools since a home-and-home series to open the 2008 and 2009 seasons, both won by South Carolina. North Carolina State last played in Charlotte for the Belk Bowl win against Louisville in 2011. 
South Carolina will be a frequent visitor to Charlotte in the coming seasons. The Gamecocks played North Carolina there last month, and return to face the Tar Heels in 2019 and 2023.
